0.text: Innate: Periodically, Ziggs'  next basic attack deals 20 − 160 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage,「 increased by 150% against structures. 」「 increased to 50 − 400 (based on level) (+ 125% AP) against structures. 」

1.text: Short Fuse's  cooldown is reduced by 4 / 5 / 6 (based on level) seconds whenever Ziggs casts an ability.

0.text: Active: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb at the target location, which explodes upon landing near an enemy, landing within terrain, or reaching its final bounce. The bomb can bounce up to two times, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.

1.text: The bomb's explosion deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.

2.text: Bouncing Bomb will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Ziggs hurls an explosive charge at the target location for 4 seconds, which grants  sight of the area and explodes after the duration. Satchel Charge can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.

1.text: Upon exploding, all enemies within the area are dealt magic damage and  knocked back up-to 500 units away from the center of the charge. If Ziggs is within the explosion, he  dashes up to 825 units away from the center of the charge.

2.text: Turret Explosion: The explosion also   executes enemy  turrets within the area and below a  percentile health threshold.

3.text: Recast: Ziggs detonates Satchel Charge. If Satchel Charge was recast while in flight, it will detonate immediately upon landing.

4.text: Ziggs does not  dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded.

5.text: Ziggs can cast any of his abilities while dashing.

0.text: Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target location, arming after 0.5 seconds and lasting for up to 10 seconds.

1.text: Each mine within the area explodes upon contact with an enemy, dealing them magic damage and  slowing them for 1.5 seconds. Enemies can detonate multiple mines but mines beyond the first only deal 40% damage to them.

0.text: Active: Ziggs hurls a massive bomb at the target location, granting  sight within a 600 radius around its destination for 4 seconds and sight in a radius around the missile as it travels to its destination.

1.text: Upon reaching the location, it explodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area, increased by 50% against those in the epicenter.
